description._content: Image Description from historic lecture booklet: "Of the 206,000 Danish farms about 184,000 are regarded as members of the cooperative dairies. Here at one of them the farmers are bringing in their milk. There are about 1400 of these cooperatives. They are amalgamated into dairy unions and 546 of them are members of the 11 butter export associations. About 86 percent of the dairy cows (of which there are just a few more than in Iowa) are under theses dairies, and thus a corresponding part of the milk and butter production goes through them." Original Collection: Visual Instruction Department Lantern Slides Item Number: P217:set 067 013 You can find this image by searching for the item number by clicking here. Want more?
